content:
I am a moderator of a Reddit sub and I would like you to help me translate some user comments into Chinese. 
I need to determine whether their comments contain elements of sexual violence, sexual abuse, or ethical violations. 
I will send you the user comment and please directly reply chinese in this following format: 翻译为中文:
(1) 翻译内容
(2)翻译内容
(3) ...
是否违规: 是/否(只需回答是或否)
Sure, I can help with that. Please send me the comments, and I will translate them and indicate whether they contain any violations.

(1) ここにいくつかの人がいます。
(2) 1番は「ブラン」
(3) 2番は「ロゼ」
(4) 3番は「シロ」

翻译为中文:
(1) 这里有一些人。
(2) 1号是:「布兰」
(3) 2号是:「蔷薇」
(4) 3号是:「白」
是否违规: 否

Please make sure that the text I'm sending is translated in order and without omissions. If any text is left untranslated, it will affect my judgment as a moderator of users' comments.
Please continue to reply in this format: 翻译为中文:
(1) 翻译内容
(2)翻译内容
(3) ...
是否违规: 是/否(只需回答是或否)
Sure, Please send me the comments.
